titles.title: Arizona National Scenic Trail Act
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the Arizona National Scenic Trail.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 1/6/2009--Introduced. Arizona National Scenic Trail Act - Amends the National Trails System Act to provide for the designation of the Arizona National Scenic Trail, extending approximately 807 miles across Arizona from the U.S.-Mexico international border to the Arizona-Utah border.
